entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Igloolik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:22 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -37.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Igloolik Airport 09:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: -37.9°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -54
Dewpoint: -41.7°C
Wind: NNW 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: A few clouds. Temperature falling to minus 41 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 41 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 43. Wind chill minus 56 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
